Activity: Morning! Blast some pop music while getting ready. Then, log into the system and check emails again. Anything urgent?
Review the notes from yesterday and plan for today's activities. Focus will be on finishing the onboarding process refinement and starting the suitability assessment questionnaire.
Finalize the refined client onboarding process document. Ensure all KYC/AML requirements are addressed and that the process is tailored to UHNWIs.
Send the refined onboarding process to @comp-1 for review and feedback. @PEOPLE = [comp-1], Topic = Refined UHNWI Onboarding Process - Review Request.
Begin researching suitability assessment questionnaires used by other firms that cater to UHNWIs. Identify key questions and areas to cover.
Start drafting the suitability assessment questionnaire. Focus on understanding the client's investment objectives, risk tolerance, financial situation, and investment experience.
Lunch with the girls (@mkt-1 and @facc-1). Discuss the latest trends and have a good laugh!
Continue working on the suitability assessment questionnaire. Make sure the language is clear, concise, and easy for UHNWIs to understand. Perhaps include visual aids.
Take a break and check Instagram for some travel inspiration. Maybe plan a weekend getaway.
Back to work. Review the draft suitability assessment questionnaire from a client's perspective. Is it too long? Are the questions relevant? Are there any areas missing?

Summarize the progress on the suitability assessment questionnaire. Prepare a list of questions for @ir-1 (Head of Investor Relations) regarding what type of information they believe would be most helpful to gather in the assessment. @PEOPLE = [ir-1], Topic = Questions regarding the UHNWI Suitability Assessment.
